name: Feedwater
description:
***READ BEFORE PLAYING***

Chrome or Firefox on desktop is recommended.

Controls
  • Keyboard
    • Move - WASD or arrow keys
    • Restart - Spacebar
    • Back to Menu - Backspace or Escape
  • Gamepad
    • Move - Left Thumbstick
    • Restart - A or Cross
    • Back to Menu - B or Circle
What is Feedwater?
  • Top-down puzzle game in a hostile radioactive environment
  • Puzzle elements are inspired by games such as Chip's Challenge and Hannah and the Pirate Caves. Booby traps that chain together arrows and dynamite block your way, while balls and conveyor belts act as tools to open up doors - can you activate all the pieces in the right order at the right time?
  • The theme of the prototype's finale is the TV series Chernobyl. I love the tension in the scenes where characters are panicking as the Geiger counter ticks away in the background and their bodies are hit by radiation - I've tried to recreate a similar experience in the final level
  • There is no sound yet - this is one of my next priorities to add some atmosphere to the game

This is a prototype only, just a small unpolished piece of the game that tests out a few concepts. I'm keen to hear feedback on what works and what doesn't . I'd also love to hear ideas for new levels and game mechanics! To facilitate this better in future, I'm also working on a level editor so that levels can be shared.
